name: ersatztv
description: ErsatzTV lets you build pseudo-live TV channels from your local media library. It schedules content into linear streams, outputs via IPTV or other endpoints, and works alongside media servers like Jellyfin or Emby.
features: Live TV Channels: Create linear streams from local media. Personal TV network.
Content Scheduling: Program your channels like real TV. Nostalgic viewing experience.
IPTV Output: Stream to any IPTV-compatible player. Universal compatibility.
Media Server Integration: Works with Jellyfin, Emby, and Plex. Enhanced media experience.
Channel Customization: Build themed channels and playlists. Creative programming control.
Self-Hosted: Run your own TV station. Your content, your schedule.
